评论详情: This bracelet is a double strand of the cutest combination of clear, white and silver beads! It has a hinge clasp that hooks on to a looped metal chain. It can be adjusted smaller or larger. The clear star beads are plastic but do not look cheap! Very cute and well-made bracelet.
